bibl.title: The Isis Cult in Western Thebes in the Graeco-Roman Period (Part II).
bibl.note: Suite de: ChrEg 90 (2015) No. 179, pp. 121-133, 1 pl. - 2. The Λογεία-Receipts from Deir Shelwit: 2.1. The content of the receipts; - 2.2. A new interpretation of the receipts. - 3. The construction of the temple of Deir Shelwit. - 4. The Isis chapel in Djeme. - 5. The priests of the Isis cult. - 6. The Isis cult before the Graeco-Roman era. - Conclusion.
